name: Curie
body: Curie is designed to be a self-hosted GMail replacement ## Components * [Incoming email processing](#incoming-email-processing) * Web service ## Incoming email processing This is the email processing pipeline: Maildir ↓ watcher.py // Watcher catches changes in Maildir, moves files | // to a storage dir and pushes messages to "inbox" queue. | // Message is just a string - a path to a raw email blob. ↓ +--------------+ | inbox | +------+-------+ ↓ parser.sh // Parser (java code) parses email messages, | // creates *.raw.json and *.parsed.json files | // (according to schemas) next to a raw email file ↓ +--------------+ | parsed | +------+-------+ ↓ indexer.py // Reads *.parsed.json files and pushes | // updates to a Solr instance ↓ +--------------+ | indexed | +------+-------+ ↓ labeler.py // Reads pre-defined filters (global and | // user specific) and adds | // labels to a doc in Solr index ↓ +--------------+ | labeled | +------+-------+ ## Web server ### Backend ### Frontend
